channel.title: Preasent prank
channel.description:
Items needed:
[ul][li]Garbage Can[/li] [li]Box (preferably the size of the garbage can)<--optional[/li] [li]Neighbor[/li] [li]Wrapping Paper with bow[/li][/ul]
Step 1:
on the night before trash pickup take your garbage can and wrap it up really well. (You can use the box to put over the trash can if you like, works best in the end)
Step 2:
Wrap it up so that nothing is showing . . .
Step 3:
Once the garbage can is fully wrapped take go accross the street and put it up on someones doorstep with a note "doesnt matter what the note says"
Step 4:
Get you really early the next morning and wait for the person to find the "preasent".
Step 5:
Watch the look on their face as they open it (if you used the box over the trash can then it adds to the moment, because they will think it's a really big gift)
Step 6:
smile and walk away :cool:

item.title: Preasent prank
item.dc:creator: @blah_bah7 blah bah7
item.description:
@blah_bah7 wrote:

nice, if they dont think its a bomb

Read full topic
